version_description:
What’s New in 3.3.1

Thank you for your feedback.

We fixed a couple bugs affecting Mobile Order & Pay:

Extra shots can now be added to items  
Duplicate size selections have been removed

V.3.3

Mobile Order & Pay

United States expansion
Everyone in the United States can now order Starbucks beverages and food directly from the app (*at participating company owned stores).  

The Starbucks application uses location services (user-enabled) to support Order features.*

Customize your drinks right in your app; simply tap on the product to customize size, milk, sweeteners, toppings and more.

The nearest store to you is selected, and you can easily change to a different store if you like.

No Time, No Line!

*Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

What’s New in 3.3.2

Whole Bean Coffee is now available in Mobile Order & Pay.

We fixed a couple bugs affecting Mobile Order & Pay

Thank you for your feedback.

New in 3.3.3

Whipped Cream!
You can add and adjust whipped cream again in Mobile Order & Pay. 

Digital tipping fix
We addressed an issue causing a crash when accessing digital tipping in your account history.

Other bug fixes and performance enhancements in Mobile Order & Pay will help get your food and beverage exactly how you want it.

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in 3.3.5

3D Touch Quick Actions; press the app icon on your home screen to:
Pay
Reload Card
Order
Find nearby stores

Delivery!  Customers in the Seattle area, you are able to have your mobile orders delivered in under an hour in select areas.

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in 3.3.6

You can now use Visa Checkout to add payment methods to your Starbucks account.

Thank you for all your feedback.

The Sound of Starbucks
Now, you can discover music playing in participating U.S. Starbucks stores*, save songs to a playlist on Spotify and take the music with you when you leave. Location services must be enabled to use this feature.**

*This functionality and in-store overhead music experience provided by Starbucks.
**Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

Thank you for all of you feedback!

Welcome to the new Starbucks Rewards™!
 
It’s an exciting new program that gives members more Stars based on what you buy, no matter how often you visit. 
 
We have changed the look and feel of the app, including:

•  A brand new dashboard where you see your stars, rewards, offers, music and more, all in one place.
•  Star Balance – keep track of the number of Stars you’ve earned and how many you need until your next Star Reward.
•  Redeem offers – now you can redeem offers (like earned free drinks and food!) with your mobile order.
•  Improved mobile ordering experience for VoiceOver users.

Thank you for your feedback.

We have fixed bugs that affected app performance.  We have also addressed some of the translation issues in the app . Users will now enjoy an enhanced home screen content experience with offers, rewards, news and more.

New in 4.1

Location Services:
We’ve made an enhancement to location services to default to “only while in use”.  

Enable Location services to get travel times to your Mobile Order & Pay store and the in store Spotify music experience. 

Look for other fun animations with your stars.

Bug fixes:
Many fixes to the dashboard and history

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in Release 4.2

Touch ID:

Tired of typing your password in when you’re standing in line? Save time and keep it secure using Touch ID. We now support Touch ID as an alternative to your password for Starbucks card reloads and gift purchases.
 


Bug fixes:

Many fixes and performance enhancements to the Mobile Order & Pay feature

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in Release 4.2.1

Rewards:

We’ve spruced up how you see your Rewards. Tap the new Reward Bar on your Dashboard to see all your Rewards, and how many Stars you need for the next one.
 

Bug fixes:

Many fixes and performance enhancements.

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in Release 4.2.2

Features:

We have heard your feedback and have introduced an easy way to get to your Inbox messages. Tap on the “Messages” navigation in the home screen for a one click access to messages.

Bug fixes:

Many fixes and performance enhancements.

Thank you for all your feedback.
This release includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.

New in 4.2.4


Mobile Order & Pay:

Enhanced store selection 
Tap the drop down arrow to reveal a quick list of nearby stores.  
Full map view is available if you need to pan the map.  

Coming Soon: Favorite and Previous stores

Enable Location services to get travel times to your Mobile Order & Pay store and the in store Spotify music experience. 

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in 4.2.5

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Thank you for all your feedback.

Mobile Order & Pay:

Enhanced store selection with Favorites and Previous!
  Most frequent or Favorite store is now the default store selection 
  Tap the heart in the list to ‘Favorite’ your stores
  Tap the drop down arrow to reveal a quick list of Favorite, previous and nearby stores
  Full map view is available to pan the map

Enable Location services to get travel times to your Mobile Order & Pay store and the in store Spotify music experience. 

Thank you for all your feedback.

New in 4.3

Mobile Order & Pay:

Favorite products!
You can save your favorite items by tapping the heart in your order

Tap Add another item, or “Menu and Favorites” to view your list of Favorites, then one click to add them to your order


Thank you for all your feedback.

New in 4.3.1

Chase Pay
Starbucks now supports Chase Pay, a new digital wallet that lets you access your Chase credit or debit cards for Starbucks card reloads.

Mobile Order & Pay: 
Favorite items (Updates)
 
Customizing an item in to a pre-existing favorite will fill in the heart
 
Previous items saved as favorites will fill in the heart
 
Duplicating favorites provides the correct Favorite status

You can save your favorite items by tapping the heart in your order
 
Tap Add another item, or “Menu and Favorites” to view your list of Favorites, then one click to add them to your order
 
 
Thank you for all your feedback.

New way to pay
See your available card balance and quickly access the barcode to pay in store from the green floating button on your home screen.  

Start an order while signed out
Browse the menu, see stores near you and add items to your order. Sign in or create an account to pay and complete your order.

Order store location
Item availability varies from store to store. Now you can set your store location to see what’s available before adding items to your order.

Order navigation
New look, new navigation! Tabs offer an easier way to navigate the menu, featured items, view previous orders and favorites.

Previous orders
In the Previous tab, see recent orders and quickly order again. After you place an order, Previous will display store location, directions, and prep time. No more trips to the wrong Starbucks (or is that just us?)

Favorites tab
In the last release, we launched the option to save your customized food and drinks to Favorites. With the improved navigation, Favorites are now always on hand. 

Recommendations
As items are added to your order, you will now see suggested items for food or drink pairings. 

Featured menu
Feel like mixing up your routine? Never miss out on what’s new in your local store by viewing featured food and drink items. 

--

Bugs and fixes:

Dynamic character count on a personal message with a digital gift card no longer wonky.

Mysterious disappearing navigation when adding a tip from a receipt has been resolved.

Improvements made to VoiceOver for payment and order features.

Payment method associated with Visa Checkout is now represented correctly when adding money to a card.

Apple Watch
Star balance and available Rewards are now on your watch face with brand new complications. It's been a while since our last update, we hope you enjoy the overall app performance improvements with this release.

Starbucks® Gifts in iMessage
Send a digital gift card with the Starbucks® iMessage app and Apple Pay. Surprise someone special with an instant gift, seamlessly integrated into your texting conversation. It’s way more delightful than asking someone you love to check their email.

Mobile Order & Pay
Reviewing your order has a brand-new look and animations. Remove or duplicate items with a tap.  You can now see all customizations in the updated card views.  Visual updates to suggested items.

Store locator
Are you as obsessed with Nitro cold brew as we are? Find it at a store near you with a new filter option.

- Joining the Starbucks Rewards™ program is easier with step by step set-up
- Enhancements to Mobile Order & Pay (US & CA ONLY)
- Various bug fixes and performance enhancements

Thank you for all of your feedback.

*   Enhancements to Mobile Order & Pay for adding products to your cart
          -   Tap the plus (+) or Add all buttons in ‘Previous’ to quickly reorder your usual daily order
          -   Access your order any time by tapping the cart in the lower right corner
          -   View product details and customization options before adding items to your order
*   Joining the Starbucks Rewards™ program is easier with Apple Pay
*   Various bug fixes and performance enhancements

Thank you for all of your feedback.

*   Star Streak Offers
     -   Opt in to the offer from the dashboard.
     -   Make purchases for prescribed number of days in a row and earn bonus stars.

*   Mobile Order & Pay
     -   Previous orders are now grouped and timestamped for quick access
     -   Bug fixes and performance enhancements from the last release

Thank you for all of your feedback.

•   We're updating your Starbucks card balances more often.
•   We added performance enhancements and bug fixes for customers who reload with Chase Pay.
•   We fixed an issue that sometimes would show the wrong store location in Transaction History.
•   We expanded TouchID, you can now log in to the Starbucks app using TouchID.
•   Mobile Order & Pay performance enhancements

•   We're updating your Starbucks card balances more often.
•   We added performance enhancements and bug fixes for customers who reload with Chase Pay.
•   We fixed an issue that sometimes would show the wrong store location in Transaction History.
•   We expanded TouchID, you can now log in to the Starbucks app using TouchID.
•   Mobile Order & Pay performance enhancements

- Improved usability for Chase Pay reloads.
- In this release, you can now find a store under the stores tab, tap 'Order here', and start your Mobile Order from there.

Now supports iOS 11.

Apple Watch app
Customers on watchOS 4 can now use their Starbucks Card directly from their Apple Watch to pay in-store, as well as to reload Starbucks Cards using Apple Pay.
This release addresses known crashes recently introduced.

Mobile Order & Pay updates

Share -

*You can send a link to fully customized beverages and food directly from the detail page.  You can share via the standard sharing features set up on your phone (ex. Text message, email, social channels, etc.).

* New Featured Menu

* Check out the new carousel view for Featured beverages, food and At-home coffee.  Find all your seasonal favorites here.

Thank you for all your feedback.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Better visualization of Reward stars
Improvements to the “Search” feature to improve result accuracy
Continued improvements to support iPhoneX and iOS 11
Bug fixes for the Apple Watch
Mobile Order & Pay performance enhancements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
The store finder has been improved with map feature, search and filter updates, making it easier to plan your visit or place a mobile order.
Simpler Sign-up experience, Improved Store Locator, Enhancements, and Bug Fixes

Introducing the option to check out as a guest in Mobile Order & Pay.  Place your order to a preferred Starbucks store ahead of your in-store arrival.
Updates to "Pay" to make it easier to see all of your cards and their balances at a glance
Updates to "Gift" to make browsing a nicer, more accessible experience
Other usability improvements and bug fixes
New features and enhancements.

• It’s now easier to browse and send gifts. 
• Paying in a store with a barcode has a new look and ease to it. 
• And there are added options for which emails you receive from us.
Bug Fixes
We've made improvements to make it easier to pay, send Gifts to friends and family, and manage payment options.
Improvements to payment and polishing touches in the gift experience.

You’ll see improvements to where you review your order before you place it. We also made some updates to help things run smoothly. If you have a Reward, you can now scan your barcode at any time and let the barista know which drink or food you’d like to apply your Stars toward.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
You’ll see improvements both to the order ahead steps that help you review before you pay, and a drink or food item’s details and customizations for when exploring something new on our menu.
Updates to reload functionality and home screen.
You’ll see the polish of recent updates now in settings, managing payments, and the music experience.

Hi there, coffee lovers. We’re excited to share the new navigation in our app. It’s now easier than ever to get what you need, like the barcode screen from the one-tap Pay button. And, your order now stays in your bag as you explore other features in the app. Your thumbs will thank you.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.

The Starbucks Rewards™ section has a new look! You’ll now see how close you’re to your next Reward and be able to act on it quickly from the Home screen. We also simplified getting to your transaction history, where you can track your action in one place.

The Starbucks Rewards™ section has a new look! You’ll now see how close you’re to your next Reward and be able to act on it quickly from the Home screen. We also simplified getting to your transaction history, where you can track your action in one place.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
You’ll see improvements both to the order ahead steps that help you review before you pay, and a drink or food item’s details and customizations for when exploring something new on our menu.

You’ll see improvements to where you review your order before you place it. We also made some updates to help things run smoothly. If you have a Reward, you can now scan your barcode at any time and let the barista know which drink or food you’d like to apply your Stars toward.
New Rewards, new choices — see what’s new and how to use Stars toward your favorite things.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.

Happy pumpkin spice season! With this update, finding and choosing the right Store should be a little easier whether you’re just browsing or finishing an Order. Plus, we’ve made Offers a little clearer, added Apple Pay as a payment option for Gifting, and tweaked some parts of the app for the better.

Happy pumpkin spice season! With this update, finding and choosing the right Store should be a little easier whether you’re just browsing or finishing an Order. Plus, we’ve made Offers a little clearer, added Apple Pay as a payment option for Gifting, and tweaked some parts of the app for the better.
We’re adding 2-factor authentication to our security features. When you turn it on, you’ll get a code to verify it’s really you as an extra check.

Merry Coffee!
With our holiday update, you can easily add Starbucks gift cards to your account using your phone’s camera. We addressed some login issues — if you’ve had trouble recently, give it another try. Plus, we fixed bugs and tidied up behind the scenes.
We found a few places in the app that needed a little polish before the holidays.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We’ve rethought Bonus Star offers to be easier to use (and easier on the eyes). Start an offer and see for yourself!
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.

Thank you to our customers and baristas during this challenging time. We've introduced a $5 tip option for those that want to recognize our amazing baristas.

Pay -> Scan
We've made the in-store payment experience a little smoother — when you tap the new "Scan" tab at the bottom of the app, your default barcode is right there waiting.

We’re opening more stores to serve you, with entryway pickup, grab-and-go service, and drive-thru.
We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes updates to help things run more smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
Check out the improvements to the Scan screen — your name is at the top of the screen for easier use in drive-thru, and Starbucks Card artwork should look a bit nicer.
Check out the improvements to the Scan screen — your name is at the top of the screen for easier use in drive-thru, and Starbucks Card artwork should look a bit nicer.
We've made finding store pickup options — in-store, drive-thru, and curbside pickup — easier to find throughout the app.

Oh hey, new ways to pay with the Starbucks app!
Earn 1 Star per dollar when you order and pay directly with a credit/debit card or PayPal in the app, or when you scan your app and pay in a store.
Earn 2 Stars per dollar when you preload your Starbucks card (included with your account) and use it to pay instead.
A new Offers tab houses ways to collect Bonus Stars through challenges, games and more.
Plus, there’s more detailed store information throughout the app.

Hi there! After updating, you’ll find a new Review Order experience where you can choose your pickup method before checkout, a new search experience in order, and clearer, more useful information after you place an order. Plus, store detail pages have been refreshed.

This version of the Starbucks app comes bearing a few gifts — for starters, you’ll find a new receipt icon on the Home tab for easy, one-tap access to your transaction history and tipping opportunities. You may find some fun new Offer types, too. We’ve made it a lot clearer if your credit or debit card is expired. And we’ve infused a little extra good cheer for good measure. Happy holidays!

This version of the Starbucks app comes bearing a few gifts — for starters, you’ll find a new receipt icon on the Home tab for easy, one-tap access to your transaction history and tipping opportunities. You may find some fun new Offer types, too. We’ve made it a lot clearer if your credit or debit card is expired. And we’ve infused a little extra good cheer for good measure. Happy holidays!
Happy New Year! In this release, folks celebrating a birthday should see an improved birthday experience. Also, we fixed some behind-the-scenes issues to make an overall better app.
Happy New Year! In this release, folks celebrating a birthday should see an improved birthday experience. Also, we fixed some behind-the-scenes issues to make an overall better app.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We made some changes to make things run smoothly.
We’ve made coupons easier to find — the Offers tab now shows all of your coupons and Bonus Star opportunities.
We’ve improved how you customize food and drinks! It’s easier than ever to explore and personalize items before you order.
We’ve improved how you customize food and drinks! It’s easier than ever to explore and personalize items before you order.
We’ve made store selection easier, and curbside check-in speedier. Plus, when you complete a Bonus Star challenge, we’ll celebrate your accomplishment with a little more fanfare.

Let the fa la la begin — it’s holiday season! We hope you enjoy a few tweaks (including an optional holiday app icon) for a bit more seasonal joy.

We’ve revamped the History feature — you’ll find a refreshed design with clearer, more complete receipts and easier tipping options. Plus, any coupons on your account have a nicer look. Happy holidays!

The holidays may be over, but we’re still in the gift-giving mood. With this update, you’ll be able to easily see when an item is out of stock at a selected store. Plus, you can add items to a new order directly from a receipt, and we added a new way to set up quick reordering with Siri.

This month, history is a bit nicer, accessibility in the store finder is more thoughtful and the Apple Watch app looks better on newer watches. And as always, we’re improving things behind the scenes.

This month, history is a bit nicer, accessibility in the store finder is more thoughtful and the Apple Watch app looks better on newer watches. And as always, we’re improving things behind the scenes.
This month, you’ll find in-store orders on the “Previous” tab when you go to place an order. And as always, we’ve polished a few things, improved accessibility, and fixed some bugs.
